TextView.android:text: The basic unit of the Android UI is the View. A View represents a widget that has an appearance on the screen. An Activity contains Views and ViewGroups. Examples of widgets are buttons, labels, text boxes, etc. One or more Views can be grouped together into a ViewGroup. A ViewGroup provides the layout in which you can order the appearance and sequence of views. Examples of View groups are LinearLayout, Relative Layout, etc.
